Improvements.Description: The variable names 'total', 'count', etc. are too generic. They should be more descriptive to improve code readability.
Instead of checking if an object is null using '!= null', use Objects.nonNull() method. This will enhance code readability.

Improvements.Improvement: Use constants for repeated string values
Improvements.Description: The string 'total' and 'count' are used multiple times in the code. These should be replaced with constants.
